page.title: 18CLUBS IN CONNEL AREA
page.content: GLIDING_takes place from North Connel airstrip on Saturdays and Sundays and some evenings in summer.Membership is Â£24 a year. RIDING_pony trekking in Connel(Â£2.50 for 1hr.trek).Riding School in North Connel(lessons Â£3.50). DANCING_classes for Highland dancing are held weekly in Connel(Â£10 a term). BROWNIES_in Connel and North Connel for girls of 7 up to 10(Â£3.50 a year). GUIDES_next rank after Brownies for girls up to 15(Â£3.50 a year). CUBS_for boys of 7 up to 12 years(Â£5 a year)_meet in North Connel hall. SCOUTS_meet in North Connel hall.This is the next rank after Cubs for boys up to 15 years(Â£5 a year).
